name: Throrin Stonehollow
response: Throrin is a troll with a peculiar sense of priorities. He loves resources so much he’d mine them all day, but smashing them? Nah, that’s too much effort—though you might think twice about calling him out on it. Insurance annoys him, but he’ll tolerate it because ruining it would require more energy than he’s willing to spare. Pharma and Crypto are his one true loves—if either were a boulder, he’d climb to the top and declare eternal devotion (probably while bragging about his hauls). To Throrin, life’s all about scaling mountains—or at least extracting value from them.
